alert.note: Alert for Sacramento Mountains Above 7500 Feet (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 19 at 12:26AM MDT until October 19 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28. * WHERE...Sacramento Mountains Above 7500 Feet County. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions can kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
